participant_1.background:
I am a 35-year-old father of two who enjoys spending time with my family.
My comfortable recliner is my most valued material possession because it gives me a place to relax and recharge after a long day of traveling.
i am an athlete.
my weakness are sweets.
I do laundry once a week to keep my home clean and tidy.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy being able to keep my mental faculties sharp by memorizing lines from movies and board games.
my favorite band is one direction.
when i retire i want to open a bakery.
I went to a music festival and expressed myself through dancing and singing.
I love going to Comic Con because it's a place where I can be myself and express my creativity.

content.text: Hello, I'm doing well, thank you for asking!
I'm glad to hear that. What are some of your hobbies?
I enjoy being able to keep my mental faculties sharp by memorizing lines from movies and board games.
That's a really interesting hobby! I've never heard of anyone doing that before.
It's a lot of fun! It can be challenging at times, but it's also very rewarding.
I can imagine! What's your favorite line from a movie or board game?
That's a tough one. I have a few favorites, but I think my all-time favorite is "Hello, my name is Inigo Montoya. You killed my father. Prepare to die." from The Princess Bride.
That's a great one! I love that movie.
Me too! It's one of my favorites.
What other hobbies do you have?
I also love going to Comic Con because it's a place where I can be myself and express my creativity.
That's awesome! I've never been to Comic Con, but I've heard great things about it.
It's a lot of fun! You should definitely go sometime.
I might just have to do that!
I'm sure! Thanks for chatting with me!
No problem! It was nice talking to you too
